00075 //## Other Operations (inline)
00076 //## Operation: operator()%924021901
00077 template <class T>
00078 inline void deleter<T>::operator () (T* p)
00079 {
00080   //## begin deleter::operator()%924021901.body preserve=yes
00081         if(p) delete p;
00082   //## end deleter::operator()%924021901.body
00083 }

00090 template <class key, class val>
00091 inline void map_deleter<key,val>::operator () (std::pair<key,val*>& arg)
00092 {
00093   //## begin map_deleter::operator()%924021900.body preserve=yes
00094         if(arg.second) delete arg.second;
00095   //## end map_deleter::operator()%924021900.body
00096 }
